dcterms:description: A synthetic dataset consisting of 2,400 nodes where the probability of building an edge between any two nodes is set to 0.01. The feature matrix is generated by sampling from a Gaussian distribution with the same covariance matrix but different centers, with nodes sharing the same center assigned the same label.
dcterms:title: FEA. SYN. DATA

dcterms:description: A synthetic dataset divided into three communities, where the probability of building edges between nodes in each community is 0.03 and between communities is 0.0015. Node features are generated by three different Gaussian distributions, with nodes in the same community sharing the same feature distribution and label.
dcterms:title: TOP. SYN. DATA

dcterms:creator: Z. Yang
W. Cohen
R. Salakhudinov
dcterms:description: A citation network dataset containing sparse bag-of-words feature vectors for each document and a list of citation links between documents, treated as undirected edges.
dcterms:title: CORA

dcterms:creator: Z. Yang
W. Cohen
R. Salakhudinov
dcterms:description: A citation network dataset similar to CORA, containing sparse bag-of-words feature vectors and citation links.
dcterms:title: CITESEER

dcterms:creator: Z. Yang
W. Cohen
R. Salakhudinov
dcterms:description: A citation network dataset containing sparse bag-of-words feature vectors and citation links, similar to CORA and CITESEER.
dcterms:title: PUBMED

dcterms:creator: A. Bojchevski
S. G ¨unnemann
dcterms:description: An extended version of the PUBMED dataset, used for unsupervised inductive learning via ranking.
dcterms:title: PUBMEDFULL

dcterms:creator: O. Shchur
M. Mumme
A. Bojchevski
S. G ¨unnemann
dcterms:description: A segment of the Amazon co-purchase graph where nodes represent goods and edges indicate that two goods are frequently bought together.
dcterms:title: AMAZON COMPUTERS

dcterms:creator: O. Shchur
M. Mumme
A. Bojchevski
S. G ¨unnemann
dcterms:description: Another segment of the Amazon co-purchase graph similar to AMAZON COMPUTERS.
dcterms:title: AMAZON PHOTO
